content: Phase 1a: Add Option::None variant-specific knowledge in mutation_knowledge.rs
Phase 1a: Update EnumVariantInfo::build_example to accept depth and enum_type parameters (DESIGN-2)
Phase 1a: Thread depth parameter through build_variant_data_example (DESIGN-1)
Phase 1a: Update build_all_enum_examples to pass both depth and enum_type
Phase 1a: Add exact type knowledge check to build_enum_example (Fix 3)
Phase 2b: Remove wrapper detection from build_example_value_for_type_with_depth
Phase 3a: Remove TypeKind::Option variant from enum definition
Phase 3b: Delete wrapper_types.rs and remove module reference
Phase 3c: Remove wrapper_info field from MutationPathContext
Phase 3c: Update method signatures to remove wrapper_info parameters
Run final build-check.sh and cargo clippy
Run cargo nextest run for validation
